newsitem.title: UK: European veg oils end the day in lacklustre mood.
newsitem.headline: European veg oils end the day in lacklustre mood.

text.p: European vegetable oils ended Friday lacklustre with early losses on the Chicago soybean oils futures edging traders back towards a bearish sentiment.
No trade was reported in any sector throughout the whole of the afternoon, with the morning session having faired poorly as well.
During the morning, Palm olein was traded at $580 and $562.50 for Jun and Jul/Sep respectively. Crude palm oil saw the only other trade at $543.50 for Jul/Sep and $542.50 for Aug/Sep.
At the close selling levels ranged from $2.50 below Thursday's close to $2.50 above.
The soft oils finished unchanged to 0.50 guilders up but may drop back next week if Chicago ends down.
Coconut oil closed $2.50 higher than its previous close but unmoved from Friday's midday levels.
